original_text:
but the man who touches them
    arms himself with iron and the shaft of a spear,
    and they are utterly consumed with fire.”
korean_text: 그것들을 만지는 자는 철과 창자루를 가져야 하리니 그것들이 당장에 불살리리로다 하니라

sentences.original_text: but the man who touches them
arms himself with iron and the shaft of a spear
and they are utterly consumed with fire
